message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob! 50-50 seems reasonable, don't you think?
You said 50-50 was fair, I'll give you a bit less, now it's your turn to make a better offer!
You think 40 is a good offer? I think 55 is a better deal!
You want 55? I'll give you 30, it's a better deal for me, but still generous!
You're getting greedy, Bob! I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I need 65 to make it worth my while!
You want 65? I'll give you 15, you're not getting rich off me, but I'm not getting rich either!
Bob, I'm starting to get worried. If I don't get a better deal, I'll be left with nothing. I need 70 to make it worth my while.
You want 70? I'll give you 10, you're running out of time to make a better offer, Alice!
Bob, I'm desperate. I need 80 to make it worth my while. Please, accept this offer before it's too late!
You want 80? I'll give you 5, you're really running out of time now, Alice, and I'm not getting any younger!
Bob, I'm begging you. Please, accept this offer. I'll take 90, it's the best I can get. Please don't leave me with nothing.
You want 90? I'll give you 1, you're really out of options now, Alice. It's either this or nothing!
